settings.text: Save at least $10.00 compared to Amazon when you purchase directly from our shop

settings.title: Owner
settings.text: I, Marco Braun, am 35 years old and live near Munich with my 93-year-old grandmother. I am the owner of the brand and currently responsible for everything, including purchasing, advertising, shipping, customer service, etc. If you call or write, you will always be in direct contact with me. Phone or Whatsapp +4917657965403

settings.title: Storage
settings.text: I am very proud to collaborate with Fulfillment Hub USA. They handle our storage and shipping operations across the entire United States. Our warehouse is strategically located in Miami, ensuring fast and efficient delivery to our customers.
